title: Miguel Barclay’s Slow-Cooked Chilli
directions: Heat the olive oil in a casserole dish (or pan with a lid) over a medium to high heat. Season the pork steak, then brown on all sides in the pan. Add the onion, cook for 5 mins and as it softens, add the tomatoes, 100ml water, the stock cube, cumin and chilli.

Turn the heat down, cover and simmer gently for about 3 hrs. Add the baked beans 2 mins before serving. Pull the meat apart using two forks, then serve the chilli topped with crème fraîche and the spring onions.
